title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Don Lemon plays Rush on Trump and Fauci. Judge Sullivan goes after Flynn. Somebody is scared to death of what Flynn knows. Trump says Obama should testify under oath about coup against him. Obamagate is all about politics, Obama's ego, nothing happened without Obama's knowledge. Mnuchin on Rush saying Dem governors want to crash the economy. NPR says novelist Philip Roth was tormented by a flatulent cab driver blaring Rush. Coronavirus takes on the permanence of climate change. New scare over coronavirus risk to children.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Senator Burr under FBI investigation for stock trades. FBI seized his iCloud backup from Apple, got search warrant for his phone. Ember coffee mug. Rush impressed by first-time author Christopher Rosow. Caller says Washington State governor Inslee plans to forcibly quarantine coronavirus patients away from their families. Judge Sullivan is trying to extend Flynn case, hoping Trump loses the election, force Trump to pardon Flynn. Rush retraces the Flynn set up.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush couldn't put down Christopher Rosow's Ben Porter Series of novels "False Assurances" and "Threat Bias." Rush couldn't get through TV show Pennyworth, but Tiger King is worse. Jay Inslee. Apple and Google join forces to do COVID-19 contact tracing. Rick Bright "whistleblower" hearings is extension of effort to take down Trump, has same lawyer as Blasey-Ford, hearing was just platform to bash Trump. Will Democrat governors pay for the lockdowns in November? DiFi questioned by FBI, turned over records, Burr's phone seized with search warrant. Trump knows what he's up against with Fauci and blue state governors. Wisconsin court overthrows governor's shutdown orders. Will blue state voters revolt?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
